title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Mobile Microlearning for Developing Working Memory Assessment Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Applying the ADDIE model (Analysis-Design-Development-Implementation) to prototype a working memory assessment tool.
Designing and validating at least three context-based working memory tasks suitable for corporate environments.
Conducting usability and comprehension tests of the assessment tool via a mobile microlearning platform.
Analyzing and reporting working memory measurement results, including metacognitive assessment items.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
